DataElementConcept.preferredName: Clinical Study Additional Information Negation Evaluation
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Indicator relating to addition information why a patient is found inevaluable by study chair per protocol.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A type of research study that tests how well new medical treatments or other interventions work in people.  Such studies test new methods of screening, prevention, diagnosis, or treatment of a disease.  The study may be carried out in a clinic or other medical facility.  Also called a clinical trial.

Concepts.definition: Research conducted with human subjects or on material of human origin in which an investigator directly interacts with human subjects; includes development of new technologies, study of mechanisms of human diseases, therapy, clinical trials, epidemiologic, behavior, and health services research.

Property.preferredDefinition: Added; extra. (from American Heritage Dictionary):Knowledge derived from study, experience, or instruction that has been gathered or received by communication.:An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.:Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.

Concepts.definition: Added; extra; further.
Knowledge derived from study, experience, or instruction that has been gathered or received by communication.
An operation in which a term denies or inverts the meaning of another term or construction.
Systematic, objective appraisal of the significance, effectiveness, and impact of activities or condition according to specified objectives and criteria.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: the management of a research protocol and its case report forms.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form

PermissibleValues.value: Disease Assessed, but not per protocol

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The formal plan of an experiment or research activity, including the objective, rationale, design, materials and methods for the conduct of the study; intervention description, and method of data analysis.: Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or not been completed.: The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: The formal plan of an experiment or research activity, including the objective, rationale, design, materials and methods for the conduct of the study; intervention description, and method of data analysis.
Indicates a task, process or examination that has either not been initiated or not been completed.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.: Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory.

Concepts.definition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.
Something that is a necessary condition; something that is obligatory.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.: Not yet decided or settled; awaiting conclusion or confirmation.

Concepts.definition: Annotation used to indicate the size or magnitude of something that was determined by comparison to a standard.
Not yet decided or settled; awaiting conclusion or confirmation.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.: A tumor that can be accurately measured in size. This information can be used to judge response to treatment.

Concepts.definition: No person or thing, nobody, not any.
A finding indicating that a subject has one or more measurable pathological lesions.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

Concepts.definition: Different than the one(s) previously specified or mentioned.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2023.2.2 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0002006. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Indicates that an assessment was not performed.

Concepts.definition: Indicates that an assessment was not performed.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement._Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.

Concepts.definition: Not meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement.
Any record of an imaging event whether physical or electronic.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Not meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement._A substance present in or produced by a tumor or by the host, that can be used for differentiating neoplastic from normal tissue based on measurements in body fluids, secretions, cells, and/or tissues. Markers are used in diagnosis, staging and prognosis of cancer, provide an estimation of tumor burden, and serve for monitoring effects of therapy, detecting recurrence, localization of tumors, and screening in general populations.

Concepts.definition: Not meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement.

A substance present in or produced by a tumor or by the host, that can be used for differentiating neoplastic from normal tissue based on measurements in body fluids, secretions, cells, and/or tissues. Markers are used in diagnosis, staging and prognosis of cancer, provide an estimation of tumor burden, and serve for monitoring effects of therapy, detecting recurrence, localization of tumors, and screening in general populations.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: evaluations of the patient and the patient's disease.

An explanation of the cause of some phenomenon or action.
